headline.main: ERUPTIONS IMPEND ON RUSSIAN FRONTS; Vast Armies Are Manoeuvring During Lull After Kharkov -- Red Army Confident NEW WEAPONS A SUCCESS Winter-Trained Soldiers Have Proved Themselves -- Plants Near Maximum Output

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, June 1 -- Encouraged by the success of new weapons and by the stanchness of men called up last Fall and trained during the Winter, the Red Army now stands fully braced for battles as tough and as hard-fought as the Kharkov combat.
abstract: USSR Army confident of success in impending battles
snippet: MOSCOW, June 1 -- Encouraged by the success of new weapons and by the stanchness of men called up last Fall and trained during the Winter, the Red Army now stands fully braced for battles as tough and as hard-fought as the Kharkov combat....

byline.original: By RALPH PARKERWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
